metadataAttributes.Title: Digital Media and Marketing Strategies
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The proliferation of digital technology gives businesses an unprecedented and diverse new set of tools to reach, engage, monitor, and respond to consumers. The aggregated and voluminous digital data can also be leveraged to better target specific consumer segments. Following “Digital Media and Marketing Principles,” this course aims to give you a deeper understanding of core processes of planning a digital marketing campaign and the role of various digital channels in integrated marketing communication.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Digital Marketing,Social Media,Content Marketing,search marketing,Brand Communication,
